p: Methods: 62 patients scheduled to undergo first time aortic valve replacement had serum analysed for levels of EndoCAb, antibodies to staphylococcus (teichoic acid, รก-toxin) and also to varicella as a non-specific immune measure. The primary outcome variable was post-operative length of stay with secondary measures of incidence of post-operative infection. All patients were risk scored by means of Euroscore.
